SlightCSV
Simple and lightweight CSV parser library written in C++.

123  class slightrow_error: public exception {};
124 
128  class slightrow_input_error: public slightrow_error {
129 
130  const char* what() const throw() {
131  return "Input string is not defined or empty.";
132  }
133 
134  };
135 
139  class slightrow_separator_error: public slightrow_error {
140 
141  const char* what() const throw() {
142  return "Separator is not defined or empty.";
143  }
144 
145  };
146 
150  class slightrow_escape_error: public slightrow_error {
151 
152  const char* what() const throw() {
153  return "Escape character not set.";
154  }
155 
156  };
157 
160  class slightrow_process_error: public slightrow_error {
161 
162  const char* what() const throw() {
163  return "Row not processed.";
164  }
165 
166  };
